title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories on the x axis representing Airport, and Costs in billion euros in each Airport on the y axis.
Hong Kong (China) is higher than any other categories with value 15.9, followed by Kansai/Osaka (Japan), and Doha (Katar). Down to category Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany) with the lowest value of 3.0.
The highest value at Hong Kong (China) is almost 5.3 times larger than the minimum value of Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
The highest value at Hong Kong (China) is almost 5.3 times larger than the minimum value of Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
The difference between the max Airport Hong Kong (China) and min Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany) is 12.9.
